body:
# About Me # I'm a third year student currently studying Computer Science at Rochester Institute of Technology.
I am an RTP (or Root-Type Person) for Computer Science House ([CSH](http://www.csh.rit.edu))
For fun, I spend a large portion of my time tinkering with either my Linux boxen or random code projects that I find interesting.
![CSH Pillow and Me](https://www.csh.rit.edu/~agargiulo/csh_avatar.jpg) ## Resume ## [PDF Copy ](http://resume.agargiulo.com/resume.pdf)
[Tex source](http://resume.agargiulo.com/resume.tex.html)
[Github repo](https://github.com/agargiulo/resume)
*** ## Contact Info ## [anthony@agargiulo.com](mailto:anthony@agargiulo.com)
Sysadmin [Computer Science House](http://www.csh.rit.edu)
[agargiulo@csh.rit.edu](mailto:agargiulo@csh.rit.edu)
[Rochester Institute of Technology](http://www.rit.edu)
[amg6763@rit.edu](mailto:amg6763@rit.edu)

name: Anthony Gargiulo
